The quarter-over-quarter increase was primarily due to higher GPU sales. • Client processor average selling price (ASP) was up year-over-year driven by Ryzen processor sales. Client processor ASP was down quarter-over-quarter due to a higher mix of mobile processor sales. • GPU ASP increased year-over-year primarily driven by datacenter GPU sales.
